welcome.site.title: Drawee!
welcome.site.tutorial1: Draw a picture with other people and guess the answer!
welcome.site.tutorial2: Drawee is a game where you team up and draw together.
welcome.site.tutorial3: When the team members look at the word and draw, the other person looks at the picture and guesses the word.
lobby.toast.invite.title: Invite
lobby.drawee.information: A game to enjoy while drawing with a group of people
lobby.relay.race.information: A game in which team members continuously guess what they wanted to express
lobby.relay.race.game.title: Relay-Race mode
start.push.question: Drawing answer!
backspace: Are you sure you want to get out? Data may be lost?
relay.race.answer.relay.input: What do you think? plase enter the answer
relay.race.answer.alert: Can write 20 characters including Korean, English and numbers.
seo.games.main.title: Games
seo.games.main.description: Drawee is a multiplayer drawing game website that utilizes modern web technologies such as WebRTC, Next.js, i18n support, and Yjs to offer a seamless drawing experience to its users. With various difficulty levels, players can enjoy a wide range of drawing games and relay-race games while competing against other players from around the world in real-time. Drawee also features a chat function to enable players to communicate with one another while playing the game. With its user-friendly interface, Drawee is easily accessible to players of all ages and skill levels, making it the perfect online destination for those looking to engage in multiplayer drawing games and have fun with friends and family.
seo.welcome.keywords: multiplayer catch mind game, WebRTC, Next.js, i18n support, Yjs, real-time, competition
seo.welcome.author: startPlayUp

seo.result.title: Game Result
